name: Dreamer of Electric Sheep
description:
A procedural sandbox text-adventure by @tccoxon. 

Stuck? Try typing "help" in the text box.
Mobile users may have a better experience at: http://bytten-studio.com/dreamer/

This game contains crowd-sourced data, and may vary in quality. You can help by contacting me to blacklist any offensive nodes you find.

Follow the Twitter bot version of the game at @DreamerGameBot. 🤖

This version is a remake. The original procjam version can be found here.

Dreamer of Electric Sheep is copyright © 2018 Bytten Studio. All rights reserved.

This work includes data from ConceptNet 5, which was compiled by the Commonsense Computing Initiative. ConceptNet 5 is freely available under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike license (CC BY SA 3.0) from http://conceptnet.io.

The included data was created by contributors to Commonsense Computing projects, contributors to Wikimedia projects, DBPedia, OpenCyc, Games with a Purpose, Princeton University's WordNet, Francis Bond's Open Multilingual WordNet, and Jim Breen's JMDict.
